features: Highlighter with see-through tip so you can highlight neatly and evenly
Chisel tip lets you switch between both wide and narrow lines
Ultra-vivid fluorescent ink jumps off the page
Resists smearing of many pen and marker inks so your work stays clean
Includes 4 Tank Highlighters in assorted colors
body.description: See where you’re marking with the Sharpie Clear View highlighter! A see-through tip allows you to keep your eyes locked on the page and precisely highlight—you’ll always know where to stop! Meanwhile, the innovative blade-style tip lets you switch between both wide and narrow lines. Sharpie highlighters come with ultra-fluorescent ink that jumps off the page while resisting the smearing of many pen and marker inks, so your work stays clean.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: See-through tip lets you know when to stop highlighting Switch between both wide and narrow lines Ultra-vivid ink resists smearing of many pen and marker inks Available in a range of bright, ultra-fluorescent colors Sharpie Clear View Highlighters Always know when to stop highlighting! The Sharpie Clear View Highlighter is designed with a clear tip that allows you to see the text you’re highlighting as you go, so you can stop at exactly the right spot. The chisel tip lets you switch between both wide and narrow lines. Finally, the ultra-fluorescent ink pops on page and resists the smearing of many pen and marker inks. With the Sharpie Clear View, your text remains easily readable, and neat—because the best view is with Sharpie Clear View.

Enjoy the Clear View Clear, See-Through Tip Transparent tip helps you stay focused on the desired text to highlight as you glide across the page. Blade-Style Tip Lets you quickly switch between both wide and narrow lines. Resists Smearing Keeps most pen and marker inks from smearing so your text remains easily readable. Vivid Flourescent Ink A range of highly visible, eye-catching colors that make it easy to read and highlight notes.

reviews.reviewText: These are awesome! I hope they last a long time. I will order again and again. What a difference it makes to be able to see where to end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Bible reading
reviews.reviewText: A great improvement for highlighting important notes. I use these highlighters without any issues except for the purple which is too dark. Highlight the word of God in the Bible so he will highlight your life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The fat ones are so much better than the skinny ones
reviews.reviewText: The fat sharpie view markers are the best. They are wide enough to cover the text of most books. The skinny ones aren't as wide and I often end up having to redo the line to highlight it completely.Took off one star because I wish the fat ones had a clip to clip it on books and such like the skinny ones do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best highlighters ever
reviews.reviewText: I rarely write reviews for the products I bought, but I really recommend this set, a set with 4 most essential colors. They are easy to grip, the shade of the color is just about right, wont darken the texts, and the ink comes very smoothly but dries super fast, left the lines neat and clean, even for the highlighted were done over the just-wrote lines. With the sale price, I repurchased for another 3 sets after I tried the first set I got.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite highlighter!
reviews.reviewText: The price was great. I like yellow highlighters for work. These are chunky and easy to grip. Color is bold but translucent/light enough to read through. Just perfect!
Great product! Easy to hold. Bright, but still easy to see the words that are highlighted.
Sí están algo caros pero le gustaron mucho a mi hija y les gusta usar todos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 13, 2020

reviews.reviewTitle: These highlighters have saved me a lot of study time over the years..
reviews.reviewText: I really like these highlighters. I was a university student when i first tried these and now I'm on my 3rd set of these that i've ordered off amazon over the past 2 years or so. I've tried out other types of highlighters (including others from the Sharpie brand) and I have always come back to these.Reasons why I love these highlighters so much:1) The clear window allows you to see what you are highlighting as you go along - saving you time on studying and reading: with these highlighters, you can see exactly what you are highlighting as you go along and read. You can also stop highlighting exactly where you want too. My main issue with other highlighters is that you cannot see past the area next to where your highlighter sits on the page as you highlight, making you lose your place, highlight words you don't want, or highlight into the margins because you think there are more words in a paragraph, etc. Not dealing with these frustrations as well as being able to do a bit of 'skim reading' and highlighting has helped me save a lot of time.2) Just the right amount of colour and ink: These markers are not 'watery' or bleed through paper like some highlighters do. The amount of ink in the highlighter seems just right and you don't get ink seeping through when you have pressed your marker on the page too long. Colours are your typical highlighter pink, green, yellow, and orange.3) Nice shape and made of nice, slightly grippy material: these highlighters aren't made of the shiny type of plastic like most... They have almost a matt finish which allows you to grip better.Cons to these highlighters:1) Not long lasting: The one big downfall to these is that I have found that they do not last long. When i was studying for exam I had to replace these. Now that i'm out of school and using them more for work/personal purposes this has not been a problem.Overall, these are really good highlighters that have been designed with user's needs in mind. appreciate they aren't just a marketing bi-produt of Sharpie. You simply can't find any highlighters that compare!- I really love highlighters...
Hab mir mehr erwartet. Spitze sehr hart, Strichergebnis unregelmäßig, weil es duch die harte Spitze schwierig ist gleichmäßig auf Papier zu bleiben. Aber witzige Idee mit durchsichtiger Spitze
